original_text: Now they were bringing even infants to him that he might touch them. And when the disciples saw it, they rebuked them.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수께서 만져 주심을 바라고 자기 어린 아기를 데리고 오매 제자들이 보고 꾸짖거늘

sentences.original_text: Now they were bringing even infants to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어린 아기들까지 그에게 데려오고 있었다

sentences.original_text: And when the disciples saw it
